title: Acting Driver – Within Chennai
overview: Professional acting driver service for your personal car within Chennai city limits. Ideal for office commute, shopping, hospital visits, family travel, elderly support.

tariff.note: KM Not Counted — Only time-based.
tariff.note_ta: KM Not Counted — Only time-based.

faq.q_ta: Will the driver help with luggage?

faq.a_ta: Usually available; depends on peak time.

notes: Service starts & ends at your location.

travelGuide.history: Our Acting Driver service provides you with professional, verified drivers to drive your personal vehicle. Whether you need to commute to work, attend meetings, go shopping, or visit family, our drivers ensure you reach your destination safely and comfortably in your own car. We handle the driving so you can relax, work, or make calls.
travelGuide.timings:
• **Standard Hours:** 6:00 AM to 10:00 PM
• **Night Duty:** 10:00 PM to 6:00 AM (Additional charges apply)
• **Booking Lead Time:** Minimum 2 hours notice recommended for guaranteed availability.
tips: Ensure your vehicle documents (RC, Insurance, Pollution) are up to date.
Keep the fuel tank sufficiently filled before the trip starts.
Inform the driver about any specific vehicle quirks or handling instructions.
For long durations, clarify meal breaks with the driver beforehand.
travelGuide.dressCode: Our drivers arrive in professional attire, ensuring a presentable and disciplined service experience.

title: Acting Driver – Outstation One Way
overview: Driver takes your personal car from Chennai to any destination outside Chennai (only drop-off, no return).

travelGuide.history: Our Outstation One-Way Driver service is perfect when you need to drop your car off at another city or move your vehicle without driving it yourself. Our experienced highway drivers handle the long drive safely, allowing you to travel stress-free or send your car ahead.
travelGuide.timings:
• **Availability:** 24/7 Service
• **Night Driving:** Safe night driving guaranteed with experienced drivers.
• **Booking:** Please book at least 4-6 hours in advance for outstation trips.
tips: Check tyre pressure and fluid levels before a long highway trip.
Ensure the spare tyre and tool kit are in good condition.
Fastag should have sufficient balance for toll plazas.
Driver's return travel is their responsibility unless specified otherwise.
travelGuide.dressCode: Drivers are equipped for long-distance travel with professional conduct.

faq.q: Can I get a return driver separately?
faq.q_ta: Can I get a return driver separately?

title: Acting Driver – Outstation Round Trip
overview: Driver accompanies your car for onward & return trip. Suitable for family functions, temple tours, business travel.

travelGuide.history: Planning a weekend getaway, a family temple run, or a business tour? Our Round Trip Acting Driver service provides you with a dedicated driver for the entire duration of your trip. They stay with you, handle local navigation, and ensure your return journey is as comfortable as the onward one.
travelGuide.timings:
• **Duty Hours:** Up to 14 hours of driving/duty per day.
• **Rest Period:** Drivers require an 8-hour rest break for safety on multi-day trips.
• **Availability:** 24/7 for trip start.
tips: Arrange for driver's accommodation if staying overnight (or pay allowance).
Plan your itinerary to allow for safe driving breaks.
Keep vehicle documents handy for interstate border checks.
Discuss the route preference with the driver before starting.
travelGuide.dressCode: Professional and courteous drivers suitable for family and corporate trips.

faq.a: If trip exceeds 10 hrs, food allowance appreciated.

- Daily official visits

travelGuide.history: Our Corporate Monthly Car Rental service is designed to be an extension of your business. We provide dedicated vehicles and professional chauffeurs who understand corporate etiquette. This service eliminates the hassle of fleet management, insurance, and driver payroll for your company.
travelGuide.timings:
• **Standard Shift:** 10 hours per day / 26 days a month.
• **Flexibility:** Custom timings available upon request.
• **Support:** 24/7 backend support for replacements and emergencies.
tips: Define the reporting location and time clearly for the driver.
Utilize our monthly reporting for your expense tracking.
Inform us in advance for outstation trips to arrange permits.
Feedback mechanism available for driver performance.

Route changes should be communicated to the transport desk, not just the driver.
Emergency contact numbers are provided in every vehicle.
Regular feedback helps us optimize routes better.

travelGuide.history: First impressions matter. Our Corporate Airport Transfer service ensures your clients and executives are received with professionalism and comfort. We monitor flight schedules to handle delays proactively, ensuring a seamless experience from arrival to destination.
travelGuide.timings:
• **Availability:** 24/7 Service.
• **Waiting Time:** Complimentary 45 mins waiting for international arrivals.

tips: Provide flight number during booking for accurate tracking.
Meet the driver at the designated pickup zone (usually Pillar 10 or similar).
Keep your phone switched on after landing.
Pre-book return transfers to avoid last-minute hassle.

travelGuide.history: Start your journey with peace of mind. Our Airport Drop service guarantees punctuality so you never have to worry about missing a flight. Our sedans are clean, comfortable, and spacious enough for your luggage, providing a relaxing ride to the terminal.
travelGuide.timings:
• **Pickup:** We arrive 15 minutes before your scheduled time.
• **Travel Time:** We account for traffic buffers when suggesting pickup times.
• **Availability:** 24/7.
tips: Book your cab at least 4 hours before your flight time.
Account for peak hour traffic in Chennai (8 AM - 11 AM & 5 PM - 9 PM).
Check for your passport and tickets before leaving home.
Inform us if you have extra large luggage.
travelGuide.dressCode: Professional drivers with clean, well-maintained vehicles.

title: Tirupati Balaji Darshan Package
overview: Complete darshan package with accommodation assistance and guided darshan.

tariff.note: Total Cost includes: Doorstep Pickup, Permit, Toll, Parking & Driver Bata. Excludes Darshan Tickets.
tariff.note_ta: Total Cost includes: Doorstep Pickup, Permit, Toll, Parking & Driver Bata. Excludes Darshan Tickets.

travelGuide.history: Tirumala is home to Lord Venkateswara, an incarnation of Vishnu. It is one of the richest and most visited religious centers in the world. The temple is located on the seventh peak of the Seshachalam Hills.
travelGuide.timings:
General Darshan: 8:30 AM – 11:00 PM
VIP Break Darshan: 6:00 AM – 8:00 AM
Suprabhatam: 3:00 AM
travelGuide.dressCode: Strictly Traditional. Men: Dhoti/Pyjama with Upper Cloth. Women: Saree/Chudidhar with Dupatta.
tips: Book Special Entry Darshan (₹300) online 2-3 months in advance.
Carry original ID proof (Aadhar/Voter ID) used for booking.
Tonsuring (Mottai) is best done at Kalyana Katta before bath.
Electronic items and luggage are not allowed inside the temple queue.

whatsappMsg: Hi, I need details for Tirupati Package.
overview_ta: Complete darshan package with accommodation assistance and guided darshan.

title: Kanchipuram Temple Trip (Half Day from Chennai)
overview:
Kanchipuram is close, peaceful, and perfect for quick temple visits. We keep the pricing simple & transparent so families and senior citizens can travel confidently.

Trip Overview
- Chennai → Kanchipuram → Chennai
- 150 km approx
- Half-day or full-day options
- Great for: temple visits, shopping, senior citizens

tariff.note: Hint: We show complete fare ranges so you know exactly what to expect. No hidden fees.
tariff.note_ta: குறிப்பு: We show complete fare ranges so you know exactly what to expect. No hidden fees.

travelGuide.history: Known as the 'City of Thousand Temples', Kanchipuram was the capital of the Pallava dynasty. It is one of the seven sacred cities (Mokshapuri) in India.
travelGuide.timings: Most temples: 6:00 AM – 12:30 PM & 4:00 PM – 8:30 PM
travelGuide.dressCode: Traditional wear recommended. Modest clothing is mandatory.
tips: Visit Ekambareswarar Temple first (largest).
Kamakshi Amman Temple is the heart of the city.
Don't miss the famous Kanchipuram Silk Saree shopping.
Varadharaja Perumal Temple has the famous Golden & Silver Lizards.

faq.a: Early morning 6–7 AM avoids traffic & temple rush.
faq.a_ta: Early morning 6–7 AM avoids traffic & temple rush.

whatsappMsg: Hi, I need the Kanchipuram temple trip package.
title_ta: காஞ்சிபுரம் Temple Trip (Half Day from சென்னை)
overview_ta:
காஞ்சிபுரம் is close, peaceful, and perfect for quick temple visits. We keep the pricing simple & transparent so families and senior citizens can travel confidently.

Trip கண்ணோட்டம்
- சென்னை → காஞ்சிபுரம் → சென்னை
- 150 km approx
- Half-day or full-day options
- Great for: temple visits, shopping, senior citizens

title: Thiruvannamalai Girivalam (1 Day / Night Trip)
overview:
A peaceful spiritual trip for Girivalam or temple darshan.

Trip Info
- Chennai → Thiruvannamalai → Chennai
- 250 km approx
- Popular for Pournami Girivalam

tariff.note: Total Cost includes: 400km (approx round trip) + Driver Bata + Toll Estimates.
tariff.note_ta: Total Cost includes: 400km (approx round trip) + Driver Bata + Toll Estimates.

notes: Note: Night Girivalam requires alert drivers. We assign our most experienced night-route drivers.

travelGuide.history: Thiruvannamalai is the abode of Lord Annamalaiyar (Shiva) representing the Fire element (Agni Lingam). Girivalam (circumambulation of the hill) is believed to remove sins.
travelGuide.timings:
Temple: 5:00 AM – 12:30 PM & 3:30 PM – 9:30 PM
Girivalam: Can be done 24/7, but Pournami (Full Moon) is special.
travelGuide.dressCode: Traditional wear recommended.
tips: Girivalam distance is 14km. Wear comfortable walking shoes (though many walk barefoot).
Start Girivalam early morning or late evening to avoid heat.
Visit Ramana Maharshi Ashram on the Girivalam path.
Carry water but avoid heavy food before the walk.

faq.a: Yes — we send only experienced highway drivers.
faq.a_ta: Yes — we send only experienced highway drivers.

whatsappMsg: Hi, I am interested in the Thiruvannamalai Girivalam Trip.
overview_ta:
A peaceful spiritual trip for Girivalam or temple darshan.

Trip Info

- 250 km approx
- Popular for Pournami Girivalam
notes_ta: குறிப்பு: Night Girivalam requires alert drivers. We assign our most experienced night-route drivers.

title: Chidambaram Natarajar Temple Trip
overview: A spiritually rich trip with a relaxed journey.

tariff.note: Total Cost includes: 450km (approx round trip) + Driver Bata + Toll Estimates.
tariff.note_ta: Total Cost includes: 450km (approx round trip) + Driver Bata + Toll Estimates.

travelGuide.history: Chidambaram Thillai Nataraja Temple represents the Sky element (Akasha Lingam). It is famous for the 'Chidambara Rahasiyam' and the cosmic dance of Lord Shiva.
travelGuide.dressCode: Men must remove shirts/vests to enter the inner sanctum.
tips: Witness the Spatika Linga Puja at 10 AM.
Visit the Pichavaram Mangrove Forest nearby (15km).
The temple architecture represents the human body structure.
Dikshitars are the hereditary priests here.

whatsappMsg: Hi, I would like details about the Chidambaram Natarajar Temple Trip.
overview_ta: A spiritually rich trip with a relaxed journey.

title: Rameswaram (2-Day Trip)
overview: Long, peaceful coastal travel. Suitable for families & senior devotees.

tariff.note: Total Cost includes: 1200km (approx round trip) + 2 Days Bata + Toll Estimates.
tariff.note_ta: Total Cost includes: 1200km (approx round trip) + 2 Days Bata + Toll Estimates.

travelGuide.history: Rameswaram is one of the Char Dham pilgrimage sites. It is where Lord Rama built a bridge (Ram Setu) to Lanka. The Ramanathaswamy Temple is famous for its long corridors and 22 sacred wells (Theerthams).
travelGuide.dressCode: Traditional wear. Wet clothes are allowed after Theertham bath.
tips: Start with Agni Theertham (Sea Bath) first.
Proceed to 22 Wells Bath inside the temple (Ticket required).
Visit Dhanushkodi (Ghost Town) early morning.
Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Memorial is a must-visit.

whatsappMsg: Hi, I would like to book the Rameswaram (2-Day Trip).
overview_ta: Long, peaceful coastal travel. Suitable for families & senior devotees.

title: Navagraha Temple Tour (1 Day or 2 Days)
overview: A complete spiritual journey covering the nine planetary temples (Navagrahas) around Kumbakonam. This trip is designed to help you complete your pariharams and prayers with peace of mind.

tariff.note: Total Cost includes: 650km (approx round trip) + 2 Days Bata + Toll Estimates.
tariff.note_ta: Total Cost includes: 650km (approx round trip) + 2 Days Bata + Toll Estimates.

includes: Experienced driver familiar with temple routes

faq.q: Can we cover all 9 temples in 1 day?
faq.a: It is very tight. We recommend 2 days for a relaxed darshan.
faq.q_ta: Can we cover all 9 temples in 1 day?
faq.a_ta: It is very tight. We recommend 2 days for a relaxed darshan.

faq.a: Pickup from Chennai or Kumbakonam railway station.
faq.a_ta: பிக்கப் from சென்னை or Kumbakonam railway station.

travelGuide.history: The Navagraha temples are a cluster of 9 temples dedicated to the nine planetary deities. They are located around Kumbakonam and Thanjavur.
travelGuide.timings: Varies by temple, generally 6 AM – 12 PM & 4 PM – 8 PM.
travelGuide.dressCode: Traditional wear recommended.
tips: It is difficult to cover all 9 temples in one day. A 2-day trip is recommended.
Start early (5 AM) if attempting a 1-day trip.
Alangudi (Guru) and Thirunallar (Sani) are the most crowded.
Hire a local guide for optimal route planning.

whatsappMsg: Hi, I would like details about the Navagraha Temple Tour.
title_ta: நவகிரக Temple Tour (1 Day or 2 Days)
overview_ta: A complete spiritual journey covering the nine planetary temples (நவகிரகs) around Kumbakonam. This trip is designed to help you complete your pariharams and prayers with peace of mind.
includes_ta: Experienced driver familiar with temple routes

title: Sabarimala Yatra 2025-26 (Chennai to Pamba)
overview: A sacred journey to the abode of Lord Ayyappa. We understand the sanctity of the 41-day Vratham and ensure our drivers respect the spiritual atmosphere of your trip. Our vehicles are cleaned and prepared for the pilgrimage.

tariff.note: Total Cost includes: 1300km (approx round trip) + 3 Days Bata + State Permit. Toll & Parking extra.
tariff.note_ta: Total Cost includes: 1300km (approx round trip) + 3 Days Bata + State Permit. Toll & Parking extra.

travelGuide.history: The Sabarimala pilgrimage is a test of endurance and devotion. It is located in the Periyar Tiger Reserve, emphasizing the harmony between divinity and nature.
travelGuide.timings:
Mandala Pooja: Nov 16 - Dec 27, 2025
Makaravilakku: Dec 30, 2025 - Jan 15, 2026
travelGuide.dressCode: Black/Blue/Saffron clothes. Irumudi Kettu is mandatory for climbing the Pathinettam Padi (18 Steps).
tips: **Green Sabarimala:** Strictly NO PLASTIC. Carry water in steel/copper bottles.
**Holy Pamba:** Dip for purification only. Do not use soap, oil, or discard clothes in the river.
**Forest Protection:** We travel through a Tiger Reserve. Do not feed animals or litter food waste.
**Virtual Q:** Mandatory booking required for Darshan. Carry printed copy & ID.

whatsappMsg: Hi, I want to book a Sabarimala trip.
overview_ta:
Complete pilgrimage package from Chennai to Sabarimala (Pamba). We provide experienced drivers familiar with the ghat roads and Kerala permit regulations. 

**Season:** Mandala Pooja & Makaravilakku (Nov 2025 - Jan 2026).
**Route:** Chennai → Trichy → Kumily → Nilakkal/Pamba.

title: Pondicherry Day Trip
overview: Escape to the French Riviera of the East. Visit the serene Auroville, the beautiful Promenade Beach, Manakula Vinayagar Temple, and the French Colony. Perfect for a one-day getaway with family or friends.

routePlan.desc: Visit the Matrimandir viewing point and global township.
Spiritual pause at the famous ashram.
Blessings at the ancient Ganesha temple.
Relax at the Rock Beach & French Colony walk.

tariff.note: Total Cost includes: 320km (approx round trip) + Driver Bata + Tolls. Extra km charged if exceeded.
tariff.note_ta: மொத்த செலவில் 320 கி.மீ + டிரைவர் பேட்டா + டோல் கட்டணம் அடங்கும்.

travelGuide.history: Pondicherry (Puducherry) was a French colonial settlement until 1954. It is famous for its French Quarter architecture, Auroville, and spiritual heritage of Sri Aurobindo Ashram.
travelGuide.timings:
Auroville Visitor Centre: 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM
Manakula Vinayagar Temple: 5:45 AM – 12:30 PM & 4:00 PM – 9:30 PM
travelGuide.dressCode: Casual wear is fine. Modest clothing required for temples and Ashram.
tips: Rent a two-wheeler to explore White Town.
Visit Rock Beach during sunrise.
Try authentic French bakeries and cafes.
Auroville Matrimandir viewing requires prior booking.

whatsappMsg: Hi, I would like details about the Pondicherry Day Trip.
overview_ta: Escape to the French Riviera of the East. Visit the serene Auroville, the beautiful Promenade Beach, Manakula Vinayagar Temple, and the French Colony. Perfect for a one-day getaway with family or friends.

title: Vellore Golden Temple Trip
overview: Visit the magnificent Sripuram Golden Temple, covered in 1500 kg of pure gold. A spiritual marvel located in Vellore, ideal for a day trip from Chennai.

routePlan.desc: Sripuram Golden Temple (Evening Darshan is best).

tariff.note: Total Cost includes: 300km (approx round trip) + Driver Bata + Tolls.
tariff.note_ta: மொத்த செலவில் 300 கி.மீ + டிரைவர் பேட்டா + டோல் கட்டணம் அடங்கும்.

travelGuide.history: Sripuram Golden Temple is a spiritual park situated at the foot of a small range of green hills. The temple is covered with 1,500 kg of pure gold foil.
travelGuide.timings:
Darshan: 8:00 AM – 8:00 PM
Abhishekam: 4:00 AM – 8:00 AM
travelGuide.dressCode: Strictly Traditional. No shorts, lungis, or sleeveless tops allowed.
tips: Mobile phones and cameras are strictly prohibited inside.
Free Annadanam (food) is served to all devotees.
Wheelchair facility is available for seniors.
Star-shaped path requires a 1.5 km walk.

whatsappMsg: Hi, I am interested in the Vellore Golden Temple Trip.
overview_ta: Visit the magnificent Sripuram Golden Temple, covered in 1500 kg of pure gold. A spiritual marvel located in வேலூர், ideal for a day trip from சென்னை.

title: Mahabalipuram & ECR Temples
overview: Explore the UNESCO World Heritage sites of Mahabalipuram including the Shore Temple, Five Rathas, and Arjuna's Penance. Enjoy a scenic drive along the East Coast Road (ECR) with options to visit other temples en route.

routePlan.desc: Shore Temple, Five Rathas, Arjuna's Penance.

tariff.note: Includes: Fuel, Driver Bata, Parking. Excludes: Entry tickets, Food.
tariff.note_ta: எரிபொருள், டிரைவர் பேட்டா, பார்க்கிங் ஆகியவை அடங்கும். நுழைவுச் சீட்டுகள், உணவு ஆகியவை இல்லை.

travelGuide.history: Mahabalipuram (Mamallapuram) was a bustling seaport of the Pallava kings in the 7th century. It is known for its rock-cut temples and is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
travelGuide.timings:
Monuments: 6:00 AM – 6:00 PM
Light House: 10:00 AM – 5:00 PM
travelGuide.dressCode: Comfortable cotton clothes, hat/cap, and walking shoes recommended.
tips: Carry an umbrella and water (it gets hot).
Visit Krishna's Butter Ball for unique photos.
Sea Shell Museum is great for kids.
Don't miss the Shore Temple at sunset.

whatsappMsg: Hi, I would like to book the Mahabalipuram & ECR Temples trip.
overview_ta: Explore the UNESCO World Heritage sites of மகாபலிபுரம் including the Shore Temple, Five Rathas, and Arjuna's Penance. Enjoy a scenic drive along the East Coast Road (ECR) with options to visit other temples en route.

title: Chennai City Sightseeing (1 Day Trip)
overview: Explore Chennai’s iconic locations with a flexible plan. Visit ancient temples, colonial monuments, and the vibrant Marina Beach.

routePlan.desc: Historic church built over St. Thomas tomb.
Sunset at the world's second-longest urban beach.

tariff.note: Extra km/hour charged as per master rates. Includes Fuel & Driver.
tariff.note_ta: கூடுதல் கி.மீ/மணிக்கு மாஸ்டர் கட்டணத்தின்படி வசூலிக்கப்படும். எரிபொருள் மற்றும் டிரைவர் பேட்டா அடங்கும்.

travelGuide.history: Chennai (Madras) is the capital of Tamil Nadu. It is known for its rich cultural heritage, British colonial architecture, and the second-longest urban beach in the world.
travelGuide.timings:
Marina Beach: Open 24/7 (Best 5 PM - 8 PM)
Kapaleeshwarar Temple: 5:00 AM – 12:30 PM & 4:00 PM – 9:30 PM
Govt Museum: 9:30 AM – 5:00 PM (Fri Holiday)
travelGuide.dressCode: Modest clothing for temples. Casuals for other places.
tips: Visit Marina Beach in the evening for the breeze and street food.
Santhome Basilica is built over the tomb of St. Thomas.
Government Museum Egmore is great for history buffs.
Try authentic South Indian filter coffee.

overview_ta: Explore சென்னை’s iconic locations with a flexible plan.
